rightText: I have been in the startup space for the last four years. During that time, I have been involved in a wide variety of functional areas which include marketing, UI/UX design, web analytics, growth hacking. I am also a full stack web developer with a focus in RoR and AngularJS. I am currently working as a freelance consultant helping companies adjust feature sets and improve the UI/UX experience of their products. I am also currently working on two music projects. Prior to working in the startup space, I worked as a mergers & acqusitions consultant for a boutique firm that focuses on the government services industry.
